article_metadata.description:
KINGSTON - A website that crunches federal health data has rated HealthAlliance of the Hudson Valley's Broadway Campus among the most underperforming hospitals in the nation when it comes to readmissions for complications and for death rates.
BetterDoctor.com, based in California, has rated Broadway's embattled hospital the 19th worst in the nation, underperforming in five of 19 categories in Medicare data collected from 2010 to 2013, the most recent available.
The website uses data from
article_metadata.author: James Nani
